page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CLAIRE.
page.content: Yesterday I woke up at 7.40 am. and I got up shortly after.I went to the bathroom to wash and then back to the bedroom to dress and brush my hair. As it is long I have to have it tied back when in school. I went downstairs and made my own breakfast which was a glass of orange and a bowl of cereal. When I had finished I collected my bag and waited for my sister and my mum who drove us to school on her way to work.We started school at 9.00 am. with assembly, maths and break. After this we had environmental studies and lunch.I take a packed lunch.In the afternoon we had games (athletics) and science.By 4.00 pm. when we finished, my sister had walked from her school to meet me.We went home by bus. Dinner was at six when dad got home.As it was Tuesday we went to guides. We came home at 9.30 pm. and went to bed.
